PHRASE.LANG: Here's yet another piece of chrome coloured furniture to go along with the rest of your chrome coloured room. [#Legal]
Un autre meuble couleur chrome pour votre pièce couleur chrome. [#Legal]
Ein weiteres chromfarbenes Möbelstück für Ihr chromfarbenes Zimmer. [#Legal]
Ecco un altro pezzo di mobilia cromata da abbinare al resto della tua stanza cromata. [#Legal]
Otro mueble cromado que hace juego con el resto de piezas cromadas de la sala. [#Legal]
Here's yet another piece of chrome colored furniture to go along with the rest of your chrome colored room. [#Legal]
